name: easyCopy
short_description:
easyCopy 1.0 is a Java-based, cross-platform, simple clipboard application that facilitates the copy-paste process when creating documents with many repetitive terms. It can be useful for code development, technical design documents, test plans development etc. 
You can drag and drop the strings you want to populate the list and then copy them with a single click.

Requirements
-------------------
easyCopy requires Java Runtime Environment 7 or greater (JRE 1.7) to be installed on your system. To download the latest Java Runtime Environment, please go to: http://java.com/en/download/index.jsp

designed and developed by:
Kostas Gr (kgrigori@gmail.com)
